version_description:
- Portuguese units voices.
- Fixed unlocking clans on higher modes.
- Smaller bug fixes.

- A.I. balance and improvements – changed conditions of wars declared by other clans.
- Clan honor affects tax rebelion chances.
- Reduced recruit price and monthly rice requirements for 3 basic units.
- 20% lower army rice requirements.
- Smaller bug fixes.

– 3 new generals archers.
– Improved balance in each difficulty mode.
– Added information regarding difficulty modes.
– Clans Uesugi, Toyotomi and Asai available after tutorial.
